entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saturna Island 12:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening then becoming light before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
